column5: Lake Otukamamoan is about 45 miles or so northeast of Fort Frances. There is an outfitter who has a fly-in outpost on an island there. I can't seem to find information on that particular outfitter. Does anyone know who it is?
Thanks Mike but that isn't the one. Silver Muskie Lodge has an outpost there but that isn't the one either. Anyone? Anyone? Bueller?
http://lessardoutdoors.com/ I've been up with Bob and Brett a couple times, including my very first Canadian fishing trip where I caught my very first walleye -- 31"
Melaire Ltd. That lake is often referred to as Trout Lake.
The outfitter is Melaire (formerly Canadian Wilderness Outposts). Gordie Melville 807-274-6411www.melaire.ca
That's the one! Thanks for everyones help.
